an9.38:1.1: Atha kho dve lokayatika brahmana yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodimsu.
an9.38:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te brahmana bhagavantam etadavocum:
an9.38:2.1: “Purano, bho gotama, kassapo sabbannu sabbadassavi aparisesam nanadassanam patijanati:
an9.38:2.2: ‘carato ca me titthato ca suttassa ca jagarassa ca satatam samitam nanadassanam paccupatthitan’ti.
an9.38:2.4: ‘aham anantena nanena anantam lokam janam passam viharami’ti.
an9.38:2.5: Ayampi, bho gotama, nigantho nataputto sabbannu sabbadassavi aparisesam nanadassanam patijanati:
an9.38:2.6: ‘carato ca me titthato ca suttassa ca jagarassa ca satatam samitam nanadassanam paccupatthitan’ti.
an9.38:2.8: ‘aham anantena nanena anantam lokam janam passam viharami’ti.
an9.38:2.9: Imesam, bho gotama, ubhinnam nanavadanam ubhinnam annamannam vipaccanikavadanam ko saccam aha ko musa”ti?
an9.38:3.3: ‘imesam ubhinnam nanavadanam ubhinnam annamannam vipaccanikavadanam ko saccam aha ko musa’ti.
an9.38:3.5: tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an9.38:3.6: “Evam, bho”ti kho te brahmana bhagavato paccassosum.
an9.38:4.1: “Seyyathapi, brahmana, cattaro purisa catuddisa thita paramena javena ca samannagata paramena ca padavitiharena.
an9.38:4.2: Te evarupena javena samannagata assu, seyyathapi nama dalhadhamma dhanuggaho sikkhito katahattho katupasano lahukena asanena appakasirena tiriyam talacchayam atipateyya;
an9.38:4.3: evarupena ca padavitiharena, seyyathapi nama puratthima samudda pacchimo samuddo
an9.38:4.4: atha puratthimaya disaya thito puriso evam vadeyya:
an9.38:4.6: So annatreva asitapitakhayitasayita annatra uccarapassavakamma annatra niddakilamathapativinodana vassasatayuko vassasatajivi vassasatam gantva appatvava lokassa antam antara kalam kareyya.
an9.38:4.9: atha dakkhinaya disaya thito puriso evam vadeyya:
an9.38:4.11: So annatreva asitapitakhayitasayita annatra uccarapassavakamma annatra niddakilamathapativinodana vassasatayuko vassasatajivi vassasatam gantva appatvava lokassa antam antara kalam kareyya.
an9.38:4.13: Naham, brahmana, evarupaya sandhavanikaya lokassa antam nateyyam dattheyyam patteyyanti vadami.
an9.38:4.14: Na caham, brahmana, appatvava lokassa antam dukkhassa antakiriyam vadami.
an9.38:5.1: Pancime, brahmana, kamaguna ariyassa vinaye lokoti vuccati.
an9.38:5.3: Cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya;
an9.38:5.7: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya;
an9.38:5.8: ime kho, brahmana, panca kamaguna ariyassa vinaye lokoti vuccati.
an9.38:6.1: Idha, brahmana, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.38:6.2: Ayam vuccati, brahmana, ‘bhikkhu lokassa antamagamma, lokassa ante viharati’.
an9.38:7.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam …
an9.38:7.4: Ayam vuccati, brahmana, ‘bhikkhu lokassa antamagamma lokassa ante viharati’.
an9.38:8.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, bhikkhu sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.38:8.2: Ayam vuccati, brahmana, ‘bhikkhu lokassa antamagamma lokassa ante viharati’.
an9.38:9.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, bhikkhu sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati …pe…
an9.38:9.2: sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati …pe…
an9.38:9.3: sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.38:9.4: Ayam vuccati, brahmana, ‘bhikkhu lokassa antamagamma lokassa ante viharati’.
an9.38:10.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati, pannaya cassa disva asava parikkhina honti.
an9.38:10.2: Ayam vuccati, brahmana, ‘bhikkhu lokassa antamagamma lokassa ante viharati tinno loke visattikan’”ti.
